titles.title: Where shall our wondering souls begin

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where shall our wondering souls begin? How shall we all to Heaven aspire? As slaves redeemed from death and sin, As brands plucked from eternal fire, How shall we equal triumphs raise, Or sing our great Delivererâ€™s praise?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh how shall we the goodness tell, Father, which Thou to us hast showed? Children of wrath, and doomed to hell, But children now redeemed to God, On earth we know our sins forgiven, Blessed with this antepast of Heaven!{/lang-eng}
